elements.2211.03170_02f1664b210fd68b21e7d8d41ad40: We investigate the differences and analogies between the equation of motion phonon method (EMPM) and second Tamm-Dancoff and random-phase approximations (STDA and SRPA)
elements.2211.03170_9a2400c6b2da9934e1a62204b8a99: paying special attention to the problem of spurious center-of-mass (c.m.) admixtures
elements.2211.03170_beeda7c58b9d9ab2dc8d1d0d883cd: In order to compare them on an equal footing, we perform self-consistent calculations of the multipole strength distributions in selected doubly magic nuclei within a space including up to two-particle-two-hole (2p-2h) basis states using the UCOM two-body intrinsic Hamiltonian and we explore the tools each approach supplies for removing the spurious c.m. admixtures
elements.2211.03170_2cca6efc5eeec0d0cffdcb33042ec: We find that the EMPM and STDA yield exactly the same results when the same intrinsic Hamiltonian is used and the coupling of the Hartree-Fock state with the 2p-2h space is neglected, but, unlike STDA and SRPA, the EMPM offers the possibility to completely remove c.m. admixtures.
elements.2211.03170_04e2a870964ca8d0beac06c86883f: The random phase approximation (RPA) has become the canonical approach to study the collective response of nuclei to external probes
elements.2211.03170_ed2b223e8169ec9b153a31fc4dba7: It provides a satisfactory description of the gross features of collective modes, such as their centroid energy and total strength, and as a linear-response theory it is generally preferred over the simpler Tamm-Dancoff approximation (TDA)
elements.2211.03170_87370c3ee97d689bb286289f93b29: However, in order to describe more detailed properties, like fragmentation and damping of giant resonances (GR) beyond the Landau mechanism, it is necessary to go beyond the harmonic approximation underlying the RPA method and couple the particle-hole (p-h) states building up the RPA phonons to more complex configurations
elements.2211.03170_28b1bbf4dc20d6631e2bf94d94838: The earliest extensions were achieved within the particle-vibration coupling (PVC)
elements.2211.03170_356d1828dc31f7ece21b68b4720cc: The QPM adopts a separable interaction to generate quasiparticle RPA (QRPA) phonons and couples them to two and, in some cases, three RPA phonon configurations to describe low- and high-energy collective modes
elements.2211.03170_71d6990f099eae35ae220d6cf48ee: , the PVC had a phenomenological character and was focused mainly on the fragmentation and damping of GR
elements.2211.03170_627b6aa4cdb02683f7f865065c8f6: It was then linked to energy density functional (EDF) theories and reformulated microscopically through the use of Skyrme interactions
elements.2211.03170_7fdfc25f165bb538999f4934dcf9c: The same connection was established within the Green function (GF) framework based on the time blocking approximation (TBA) where the PVC emerges from non-relativistic
elements.2211.03170_66d101e8c003f8faaa81d8ef43eb6: Density dependent effective interactions derived from non-relativistic EDF, like Skyrme and Gogny, were also used in second RPA (SRPA)
elements.2211.03170_f08fd8b589100de2ed452c50a2cc6: The SRPA, which also has a long history
elements.2211.03170_4565897d033bfd26846ff773ee639: , is the most straightforward RPA extension
elements.2211.03170_7547f50654b2f1ff13e9c4677e928: It solves directly the eigenvalue problem in a space spanned by p-h plus 2p-2h basis states
elements.2211.03170_424a1dde7c656fe85b5a4a5fc00d2: An example is provided by the calculations
elements.2211.03170_0a323c217c0cba7207413df557c1a: performed by using a potential obtained through the unitary correlation operator method (UCOM)
elements.2211.03170_51e6835fd55110976a7dc11ca54aa: An even simpler approach is the second Tamm-Dancoff approximation (STDA) which is obtained from SRPA if the correlated ground state is replaced by the Hartree-Fock (HF) vacuum from the beginning, which in practice means that only the forward p-h and 2p-2h amplitudes are retained
elements.2211.03170_72c8637b3d40f3691628e8a148528: The RPA extensions based on the phenomenological EDF theories have to deal with a double counting problem
elements.2211.03170_dec9ba329c620d98318d56164ad6d: By going beyond the mean-field approximation, correlations already present in the ground state may be induced since the parameters of the EDF are determined so as to reproduce the ground state properties within HF
elements.2211.03170_22b14d6b5b6b579e4dc59eef719c3: In order to avoid such a redundancy it is necessary either to redetermine the parameters or to adopt the so-called subtraction method proposed by Tselayev within the GFTBA
elements.2211.03170_8913f0abcf643b122b3fac5eae148: and used also within the SRPA
elements.2211.03170_46600d9bca604ce926908f628c27d: Another direct approach to the nuclear response is provided by the equation of motion phonon method (EMPM)
elements.2211.03170_243a876540a97fc02b3c1109f7e5c: , the TDA phonons are the basic constituents of an orthonormal basis of
elements.2211.03170_01304709606faaf9ed89a3767a712: states generated from solving iteratively a set of equations of motion in each
elements.2211.03170_1dfce94d96cb255e541ea37ce370b: These states together with the HF state
elements.2211.03170_7424739b483bec669de24483991f7: are adopted to solve the full eigenvalue problem
elements.2211.03170_5ae8be10af7356e88e84e5d221c95: The method was also formulated in the quasiparticle language suitable for open shell nuclei
elements.2211.03170_4a0de33f43edba6154d534cfd758a: and in the p(h)-phonon scheme for the study of odd-nuclei
elements.2211.03170_412081c415648dad98fc49b3981fe: The EMPM does not rely on any approximation except for the truncation of the configuration space and the number of phonons
elements.2211.03170_3e9cfe8b4e9198d8f3d93cd3d339f: Therefore, we should expect that, within a space including up to the two-phonon subspace, it should yield exactly the same results one obtains in STDA
elements.2211.03170_5eee1cfc7f9c85ce711c382389218: This check represents the preliminary goal of the present work
elements.2211.03170_b8dba054946b9a92681f12b784f88: In order to make a consistent comparison between the three different approaches, we neglect the coupling between HF and two-phonon states considered in the EMPM but neglected in STDA and SRPA
elements.2211.03170_1f6bffbcf534ce75aae28ca257efa: In all cases, the excitations are built on the HF ground state, which in turn is obtained with the same Hamiltonian as used for the couplings
elements.2211.03170_89fd644d1d726a2688d1289487ace: In this sense, we call our calculations
elements.2211.03170_11cae6f17a47de10806f9221e2a4c: self-consistent." Furthermore, we take into account the interaction among the different 2p-2h configurations present in the EMPM but often neglected in both STDA and SRPA
elements.2211.03170_e0f5cdd22a992aff7237910b1cb68: The scope of our study is wider
elements.2211.03170_833157de68319db95b1a8f046bdd5: We intend to put on display analogies and differences between the three formalisms and to investigate if and how their specific features impact on their performances
elements.2211.03170_6c3c7ef428b8fdc8dad0995e55ad8: To this purpose, we will adopt the same UCOM two-body Hamiltonian throughout this work to determine the multipole response in some selected doubly-magic nuclei
elements.2211.03170_7b64142443046b604cb8e5e88a69f: We will pay special attention to the problem of the center of mass (c.m.) which may become critical once we go beyond the mean-field approximation
elements.2211.03170_de7b7b3dd36ad90373615e1c58a1b: In fact, we know that the decoupling between intrinsic and c.m. motion is achieved in RPA if a HF basis in a complete or large enough p-h space is adopted
elements.2211.03170_3eeb5dbd77f7dec08554094bfddd0: , while in SRPA this is generally not true in spite of Thouless's theorem
elements.2211.03170_3602350e46d627a48c16e7eef7365: , because the stability condition is violated
elements.2211.03170_938ece15f25d8e3a31d90ea1262ea: In TDA, the decoupling is obtained by exploiting the Gram-Schmidt orthogonalization method
elements.2211.03170_17a442dba0cedcfebe186bf7cde39: In the EMPM the c.m. spurious admixtures can be removed from the whole multiphonon basis under no constraint and for any single-particle (s.p.) basis by a method which exploits the singular value decomposition (SVD)
elements.2211.03170_ed73c432251a567fff80dde2b1f75: The comparison between the three approaches will enable us to establish the role of the c.m. motion on the different multipole responses and how important is the removal of such a motion.

elements.2211.03170_a1f224362d65809c87186337eb733: ) responses are similar in the high energy sector but behave differently at low energy

elements.2211.03170_775fd63f8f6de1baecf80a8f82e60: low-energy peaks, while the monopole spectra are flat
elements.2211.03170_c3d5526bc5f88abf805512a4dabe9: A spurious monopole peak at zero energy appears in STDA (EMPM) but not in SRPA, again because of the imaginary nature of the corresponding energy eigenvalue
elements.2211.03170_1d2db890edae7d8330769b5f04ad2: The discrepancy is solved once such a spurious excitation is removed through the SVD method

elements.2211.03170_d92f138be6c370ca2a4167e5ed1d9: state lies below the HF state
elements.2211.03170_2875bbb65e067071c368e0ec50da6: Such an anomaly indicates that, at least for the potential adopted here, it is not appropriate to consider the unperturbed HF as ground state, a tacit assumption made in RPA, SRPA, and STDA
elements.2211.03170_4abcf668bcda4279153cff8f19f57: We need to replace HF with a correlated ground state, but such a replacement would require the inclusion of 3p-3h, or 3-phonon basis states

elements.2211.03170_877803fc2d7ee349ade6f29fea05b: Their smooth evolution reflects the fragmentation of the strengths induced by the coupling to 2p-2h configurations

elements.2211.03170_a8d12cf604e7bbac01c552832e496: Another peculiarity of SRPA, which was discussed in Ref.
elements.2211.03170_edf5c8bac4e17c4cd7c70675ecafc: EWS is preserved only if we include in the running sum the negative energy
elements.2211.03170_817e36e71ebd4b978c4b3f5cfac7b: A final remark concerns the effect of the center of mass
elements.2211.03170_2c8f4f08897cb2fd2637f41c28316: The EWS of all multipolarity remains unaltered whether we remove or not the c.m. motion
elements.2211.03170_a1f66ad41489f9d1e03f427928b40: Due to this invariance, the conservation of the EWS can provide valuable guidance in any beyond mean-field extension.
elements.2211.03170_1e0a9d3fbd77bb0dee51904dd78d8: From the present survey we can draw some clearcut conclusions
elements.2211.03170_210135a207ae16cdb2c2ebef8c27c: The differences between TDA and RPA as well as between STDA and SRPA responses are marginal, except for the octupole transitions where the RPA low-lying octupole peak is shifted considerably downward with respect to TDA
elements.2211.03170_9dfe4c419516c7c60268643b6b400: In going from RPA to SRPA, such a peak is pushed further down in energy and can disappear completely if the corresponding eigenvalue becomes imaginary
elements.2211.03170_8d2007687176a5bafee6311dc0364: This instability casts a shadow on the reliability of approaches which are meant to go beyond RPA
elements.2211.03170_8799ba92a98f898fb5f9777cafee2: SRPA then remains applicable primarily on higher-lying collective modes,
elements.2211.03170_2d1c6b12c8ede65175bcc6e6ac236: The TDA and STDA spectra do not exhibit any anomaly
elements.2211.03170_a9ec61e7b120fb4dd8db6612dca7f: In RPA, it is possible to remove almost completely the low-lying spurious isovector
elements.2211.03170_6bff83beaf2ddb299a04c478f1f4e: peak thanks to the adoption of a HF basis combined with the subtraction of the c.m. coordinates from the dipole operator
elements.2211.03170_75d62778f46d72edbc42831d31302: In TDA, the Gram-Schmidt orthogonalization procedure eliminates any spurious admixtures from both isoscalar and isovector responses
elements.2211.03170_16020b616bff98cf4db47c19f1a83: In going to STDA and SRPA, however, the c.m. motion affects all multipoles
elements.2211.03170_128800b9e288c2da6a5ea7262c277: Its spuriousness spreads over the entire spectrum of each multipole thereby inducing non negligible distortions of the isoscalar
elements.2211.03170_6fbe7f43b4ccf27a778a93360131b: STDA and SRPA do not offer any recipe for removing these distortions, while in the EMPM the joint use of Gram-Schmidt and SVD pins down and removes completely and exactly the spurious admixtures from all multipole responses
elements.2211.03170_9a25e06d0eed53636b08c0a6691ce: The EMPM is exactly identical to STDA within the space encompassing 1p-1h plus 2p-2h configuration under the simplifying assumption of neglecting the coupling between the HF and the 2p-2p basis states
elements.2211.03170_e3af05f38143bc3cd057e3dbdf8b1: falls below the HF ground state, ratifies the failure of STDA and SRPA in describing the spectroscopy of some nuclei, at least for the potential adopted here
elements.2211.03170_019b2dad8c007b09d52df8222ac22: The EMPM shows how to remove this anomaly
elements.2211.03170_b319aeb87c624b2a89b30df8b12a2: One should refer the levels to a fully correlated ground state by taking into account the HF to 2p-2h coupling jointly with enlarging the configuration space so as to include the 3p-3h basis, as it was done in
elements.2211.03170_899a833a39912f96fff3e5a8d4213: In other words, one should move to full shell model or to the EMPM
elements.2211.03170_f704f648feb7bf321c8cbc2abf31c: The EMPM is more general than STDA and is exactly identical to shell model within a given configuration space
elements.2211.03170_fc863650f52bf6cb80c151ada167c: With respect to shell model, it is more involved but offers significant advantages
elements.2211.03170_1a773a3992eeacb03235b8688a9fc: It allows for truncations of the multiphonon basis even if a large space including very high energy configurations is adopted
elements.2211.03170_17cb4ed04b95b3bca7c86507bfc18: These are accounted for by the TDA phonons building up the
elements.2211.03170_1a27da30d74a2c06aa3b42437f3f8: It is suitable for investigating low energy spectra as in shell model but also the high energy responses as in RPA or SRPA
elements.2211.03170_88b7705a9848a979a134bbd7eadd0: Last, but not least, the intrinsic motion is decoupled completely and exactly from the c.m. motion for any s.p. basis and under no restrictions.
